content: When it seems like the fight is over, it's just getting started and entering its second phase. Blood will spill from the deer and pool all around it. The blood will poison you, so you'll want Antimiasma Powder to help you deal with any damage that comes from it.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Foothills_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Foothills Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Deer Sight Forest' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief - Cloudtreading Deer'.
The content is as follows:
When it seems like the fight is over, it's just getting started and entering its second phase. Blood will spill from the deer and pool all around it. The blood will poison you, so you'll want Antimiasma Powder to help you deal with any damage that comes from it.
